lead_paragraph: Michael Grandage, who won the 2010 Tony Award for best director of a play for “Red,” announced on Thursday evening that he would step down as artistic director of Donmar Warehouse in London in late 2011.
snippet: Michael Grandage, who won the 2010 Tony Award for best director of a play for “Red,” announced on Thursday evening that he would step down as artistic director of Donmar Warehouse in London in late 2011.

headline.main: Donmar Warehouse Director to Step Down in 2011
headline.print_headline: Donmar Warehouse Director To Step Down In 2011

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
